A Survey of Real-Time Machine Translation Techniques
This article provides an in-depth examination of various real-time machine translation techniques, including neural machine translation, statistical machine translation, and hybrid approaches
A Survey of Multilingual Speech and Language Processing
This article offers a comprehensive overview of multilingual speech and language processing, including simultaneous translation, and discusses various techniques and technologies used in the field
A Survey of Speech Recognition and Translation
This article provides a detailed examination of speech recognition and translation technologies, including simultaneous translation, and discusses the challenges and opportunities in the field
